column5: NEW DELHI  Aug 26 India's Tata Motors Ltd  on Friday posted a 57 percent fall in quarterly net profit  missing estimates  as foreign exchange losses after Britain's decision to leave the European Union offset higher sales at its luxury unit Jaguar Land Rover.

column4: Indian shares tread water ahead of Fed meeting
column5: Aug 26 India's benchmark BSE index  inched lower on Friday  heading for its worst week since early May  as investors stayed on the sidelines ahead a speech by U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen in Jackson Hole  Wyoming later in the day.

column5: BOSTON  Aug 26 Billionaire investor William Ackman said on Friday that Jordan Rubin  who had worked closely on Pershing Square Capital Management's controversial investment in battered drug maker Valeant Pharmaceuticals  is leaving the hedge fund.
